dataList.dlg: I have you! N-no? S-stay back!
Bow before the master of the kingdom!
The crime of treason deserves death!
N-no need to fret... Khh! I can do this... They will be quiet once I slaughter them all.

dataList.desc: 카세티 나는… 이 행진의… 왕자이다…! 사용 시
dataList.dlg: Once this march ends... I shall rise a King! To reign over all!

dataList.desc: 카세티 나는… 이 행진의… 왕자이다…! 사용 시
dataList.dlg: Observe...! For this is the true march of the Prince!

dataList.desc: 카세티 나는… 이 행진의… 왕자이다…! 사용 후 다음 턴
dataList.dlg: It hurts so... But I desire to see... the extent of this power!
Don't they understand? Hah... becoming Bloodbags'll be an improvement, an ascension!
Let's get some more blood, ha ha ha...!
